wikipedia_page.main: June Clark (born 23 June 1939)  is an Australian Paralympic lawn bowls player. She was born in Kent, England.  She won a silver medal at the 1996 Atlanta Games in the women's singles LB3-5 event.

response: Dame Margaret June Clark,  (born 31 May 1941) is Professor Emeritus of Community Nursing, at Swansea University in Wales.
